public class Edge
extends Object

A simple WFST edge representation for use in visualisation.

Constructor Detail

Edge

protected Edge(Integer startStateID,
               Integer endStateID,
               String outputSymbol,
               double weight)
Constructs a new Edge object representing a transition from one Integer to another.

Parameters:
startStateID - The transition start Integer represented by the edge.
endStateID - The transition start NFSMState represented by the edge.
outputSymbol - The symbol output by the state transition (transduction).
weight - The weight of the transition (in most cases, a negative log probability).
